|Software Development Engineer| S3, Amazon Web Services | Seattle, WA | ONSITE

Amazon Simple Storage Service (S3) is storage for the Internet. Through the use of pioneering techniques in distributed computing, developers are able to durably store their data on Amazonâ€™s proven computing infrastructure to achieve virtually limitless storage capacity at minimal cost.

We are currently looking for talented software development engineers to join our Amazon S3 data plane and manage our rapidly increasing scale in the face of explosive customer growth.

Email wantony@amazon.com to discuss.
